synopsis.text:
Kotone’s and Ayane’s childhood friend, Kazushi Sudou, finds himself in a peculiar situation when the two sisters decide to move in with him during his university years. The bond between the trio, which has been nurtured since childhood, takes an unexpected turn when Ayane discovers Kazushi using her bath salts. As a playful act of revenge, both sisters join Kazushi in the bath, leading to a moment of unforeseen closeness.

The once-innocent relationship between Kazushi and the Shirakawa sisters now teeters on the edge of romance, as the trio finds themselves entangled in a whirlwind of emotions. Will Kazushi be able to navigate these newfound feelings for his childhood friends, or will the sisters' secret affection for him further complicate their unique living arrangement?

Embark on a romantic comedy journey that explores the complexities of love between people who have been close for far too long. This engaging tale of friendship, love, and the occasional shared bath promises to keep you hooked until the very end.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
